title: So can someone explain to me what made Kog Maw into a top tier ADC right now?
body: I think he got nerfed this patch, but he is still strong nevertheless. Is it {{item:3124}} that is really making him strong? His early game also seems stronger than before. A lot of games I see, is that he wins by not just snowballing, but pushing way too hard that pressures the enemy from obtaining other objectives.
